Detailed Description

Encapsulated common functionality for UI Activities that use the shared header/footer XML layout.

Constructor

com.janrain.android.engage.ui.SharedLayoutHelper.SharedLayoutHelper ( Activity  owner  ) 

Creates instance of this class, binding it to the owner.

Inflates the common/shared menu.

boolean com.janrain.android.engage.ui.SharedLayoutHelper.handleAboutMenu ( MenuItem  item  ) 

Common handler for about menu. If the menu item is the about item, the about dialog is displayed and true is returned. Otherwise false is returned.

Dismisses the progress dialog, if valid and visible.
